channel.title: Teleporting command
channel.description:
hey its me again...
im wondering how to make a command to teleport ex: ::staff so i need the int to a command like this but the coords are not needed
source:ddsspeced

item.title: Teleporting command
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

DELTA BASED SOURCE

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { toX = put coords here for X; toY = put coords here for Y; sM("Welcome to Your Servers name Staff Room."); }

Silab Based

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { teleX = put coords here for X; teleY = put coords here for Y; sendMessage("Welcome to Your Servers name Staff Room."); }

Go in ur client.java and look for

(command.startWith

add it under there

Read full topic

toY = put coords here for Y;
sM(“Welcome to Your Servers name Staff Room.”);
}

item.title: Teleporting command
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“staffzone”) && playerRights >= 1) {
toX = put coords here for X;
toY = put coords here for Y;
sM(“Welcome to Your Servers name Staff Room.”);
}

example of mine:

if (command.startsWith(“staffzone”) && playerRights > 1) {
toX = 2981;
toY = 9913;
sM(“Welcome to Fortified-Pkz Staff Room.”);
}

NOTE: anytime you teleport with a command coords are needed you can get them by going to the area u want the staffzone to be and typing ::mypos ingame and it will give you the coords for X and Y

hope this helps

Read full topic
